name: Alice In VR
developer: Åsa Egnér,Carolina Ask, Alexander Cobleigh, Joar Löfberg
description: Fall down the rabbit hole as Alice in Wonderland! Drink from the bottle and become tiny, eat the cake and become huge. Meet the cat, the rabbit and the caterpillar - all in VR!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater Storage: 500 MB available space
